General.Name: HLB Global Co Ltd
General.Description: HLB GLOBAL Co., Ltd. focuses on the extraction and supply of marine sand and minerals. It collects, transforms, and supplies aggregates for ready-mixed concrete companies. The company is also involved in the construction of eco-friendly green walls; and production and sale of fermented beverages. In addition, it offers color cosmetics and hair care products. Further, the company develops various drugs for infectious diseases, including sepsis, influenza, and viral hepatitis; and immunological diseases, such as rheumatoid arthritis, etc. The company was formerly known as NEXT SCIENCE Co., Ltd. and changed its name to HLB GLOBAL Co., Ltd. in 2022. HLB GLOBAL Co., Ltd. was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Sabuk-Eup, South Korea.
